text:
e="preserve">Lieutenant General Manvel Sektori Grigoryan (Armenian: Մանվել Սեկտորի Գրիգորյան; 14 July 1956 – 19 November 2020) was an Armenian military and politician. He was a member of the National Assembly of Armenia from 2012 to 2018. He was a high ranking military official in the Armenian Army.
Grigoryan died on 19 November 2020 at the age of 64.
